rationale: Patient narrative details (better sugars, thirst side-effect, difficulty remembering morning dose) are entirely absent; only instructions are documented.
Note includes both hydration advice and a concrete reminder tool exactly as discussed.
No assessment or plan for T2DM, no reference to current SGLT2+metformin therapy, and no follow-up labs documented.
Irregular work/travel schedule affecting adherence is not explicitly mentioned.
Neither metformin nor empagliflozin are listed or reconciled.
No fabricated or speculative information is present; only verifiable counseling statements.
Commands used are valid Instruct commands without duplication, but other appropriate sections (HPI, Assess) are missing.
Safety counseling on DKA/UTI signs and when to seek care is largely missing; only generic hydration advice given.
